name: Twin It!
description:
TWIN IT! - WHEN THE IPAD BECOMES A PUZZLE!
--

Twin It! is a concentration game which is perfect for places where you pause and contemplate: during the lunch break, in the bus, while skydiving, or while at work (if your boss is understanding), you'll always manage to squeeze in a quick game in under 5 minutes which will reveal your passion for hypnosis and reflection.

The goal of the game is simple – you have to find the one pair of identical symbols on the entire iPad screen: it sounds easy, but it's a real challenge when more than 40 other symbols stand in your way! So, is it better to try and do it yourself and do everything alone? Or gather a few friends and all look together to try and bust some high scores?

No matter how you decide to play it, in addition to the default "Cooperative" mode, two other play modes are also available!
• The "Search" mode will show off your dexterity and will require you to be as fast as possible to empty a screen full of symbols: perfect for your training as ninja master.
• The "Versus" mode will split the screen of your iPad in two, and will allow you to face off against one of your friends in a frenzied battle, so that they can finally recognize your well-deserved supremacy (at least in terms of efficiency at emptying screens).

--
